315276.「師匠 ちょっと お伺いしたいことが……って\n バウギス どうかしたんですか？:
Master, I'd like to ask you something..."
Baugis, what's wrong?

315277.「……少し 体調を崩してしまってな。\n それより おまえたちは\n 先日のバケ:
I've been a little under the weather. Anyway,
you guys came here to ask me about the monster
from the other day, right?

315279.「廃屋の日記を 読ませてもらった。あの日記に\n 書かれていた 来たるべき日とや:
I have read the diary of abandoned house. I
would like to ask you to explain exactly what

315280.「……そうか。私の日記を 読んだのだな。\n とうとう おまえたちにも 話すべき:
I see. You have read my diary. I guess it's
finally time to tell you guys...

315281.「えっ……？ あの日記を 書いたのって\n 以前 バウギスが話してくれた\n 数:

that diary hundreds of years ago, as Baugis

315282.「……私は バウギスの血によって\n 不老長寿になったんだ。: ...I was made immortal by the blood of Baugis.

315284.「彼の血が もたらしたのは 寿命だけではない。\n あの日から 私の魔法は また:
His blood brought more than just longevity.
From that day on, my magic improved so quickly
that I surpassed everyone in the village.

315285.「だが そのせいで\n あの悲劇が 起こってしまった……。: But that's what caused that tragedy...

315286.「バウギスの血のチカラに 目をつけた\n 仲間たちが 私を人質に取り バウギスに:
The companions, who had discovered the power
of Baugis' blood, took me hostage and demanded
Baugis' blood.

315287.「私のことなど 捨て置けばよかったのに……\n バウギスは その要求に応じた。:
You should have left me out of it...Baugis

315288.「彼らは バウギスから手に入れた血を飲み\n 竜のチカラを 得た……。そう……竜:
They drank the blood of the received from Baugis and gained the power of the dragon... Yes...Dragomancers were born through such
folly.

315289.「だが それも束の間……\n 私以外の者たちは 皆 血に適応できず\n 謎のバケ:
But that was short-lived... everyone else

unable to adapt to the blood.

315290.「彼らは それでも なお チカラを求めて争い\n 虚竜が虚竜を喰らい 竜の血は濃:
Even so, they still fought for power, and as the imaginary dragon fed on the imaginary dragon, the dragon's blood grew thicker and
thicker, and finally a fearsome monster was born...

315291.「……その名は 虚竜王グリーデル。:
...whose name is Griedel, Dragon King of the
Void.

315292.「虚竜王は ありとあらゆる物を破壊した。\n バウギスの手助けで どうにか ヤツ:
The false Dragonlord destroyed everything in his path, and with the help of Baugis, he managed to seal him in the earth, but the
village of mage had been destroyed.

315293.「虚竜王は 封じられる直前に\n いつか必ず 復活すると 言い残している……。:
Just before he was sealed up, the false
Dragonlord told him that he would surely be
resurrected someday...

315294.「あの謎のバケモノは 封印されたヤツの一部が\n 年月を経て 分離し 大地から現:
The Mystery Monster is a part of the sealed monster that has separated over the years and emerged from the earth. It can be thought of
as an omen that the false Dragonlord will be resurrected.

315295.「チカラを求めてやまない 虚竜王が\n 復活すれば オーグリード大陸全土に\n:
If the false Dragonlord, who is always in
search of power, is resurrected, disaster will
befall all of Ogreed.

315296.「ヤツの復活に備え ひとりでも多くの竜術士を\n 輩出するため 血を介さず 竜と:
In order to prepare for his return and to produce as many Dragomancers as possible, I created a way to make a pact with a dragon
without blood and opened the way for Dragomancers.

315297.「そんな……最強のチカラを求めた\n 魔法使いたちが そんな末路を\n たどった:
I can't believe that the mages who sought the
strongest power ended up like that...

315298.「てめえらのせいで 世界が危機に\n さらされてるだと？ 関係ない人たちを\n:
The world is in danger because of you? You've
brought all these people into this...screw
you!

315299.「おまえの言う通りだ。\n 私たちは 取り返しの付かないことをした……\n 当然:
You're right. We have done an irreparable
thing... and we deserve what's coming to us.

315300.「だが その前に 私たち竜術士の手で\n 虚竜王を 倒さねばならない。:
But first, we Dragomancers must defeat the
false Dragonlord with our own hands.

315301.「で…でも いくら竜術士を集めたって\n そんな相手に どうやって……。:
But... but no matter how many Dragomancers I
gather, how am I going to deal with such an
opponent...?

315302.「ヤツを倒すために 編み出した奥義がある。\n だが それは 強大なチカラを得ら:
There is a secret that I have developed to
defeat him. But while it can be very powerful,
it is also very dangerous.

315303.「ゆえに 虚竜王と戦う覚悟が できた者にのみ\n 伝授することにしている。:
Therefore, it is only taught to those who are
ready to fight against the False Dragonlord.

315304.「おまえたちには 酷な選択を\n 強いることになって すまないが……\n どうす:
I'm sorry to force you to make such a terrible
choice, but... think about what you're going
to do.

315308.「案ずるな……いつものことだ。: Don't worry...it happens all the time.

315309.「だんだん ひどくなってる……。\n このまま放っておくと 命に関わるぞ。:
It's getting worse and worse... If we don't do
something about it, it could be fatal.

315310.「<pc>。すまないが ドワチャッカ大陸の\n デマトード高地の 巨竜の霊丘とい:
<pc>. Sorry, can you go get me some
Dragon Dust from a place called Dragon Hill in
the Dematode Highlands of Dwachakka?

315311.「それがあれば バウギスが\n 助かるかもしれない……私は ここで\n 彼の様子:
It might help Baugis...I'll be here watching
him...regards...!
